ZWOLF.KnacksProvidedHint: Number of knack slots this item provides
ZWOLF.RequiredKnackTagHint: If set, only knacks with this tag can be selected
ZWOLF.KnackTagsHint: Tags that describe this knack's categories
ZWOLF.TalentTagsHint: Tags that describe this talent's theme
ZWOLF.TrackTagsHint: Tags that describe this track's theme
ZWOLF.KnackRequiredHint: Prerequisites or restrictions for this knack
ZWOLF.TalentRequiredHint: Prerequisites or restrictions for this talent
ZWOLF.AncestryRequiredHint: Any special requirements for this ancestry
ZWOLF.TrackRequiredHint: Prerequisites or restrictions for this track
ZWOLF.QuantityHint: Number of items or 'many' for consumables
ZWOLF.PlacementHint: Where this equipment is currently placed
ZWOLF.PlacementDisabledHint: Placement can only be set on owned equipment
ZWOLF.RequiredPlacementHint: Where this equipment must be placed to grant effects
ZWOLF.PlacementRequirementActiveDescription: This item must be {placement} to provide its effects
ZWOLF.SizeOptionsHint: Hold Ctrl/Cmd to select multiple sizes
ZWOLF.KnackMenuHint: Description of available knacks for this ancestry
ZWOLF.VitalityFunctionHint: Formula for calculating maximum vitality points
ZWOLF.TrackTiersHint: Configure each tier of this track
ZWOLF.SideEffectsDescription: Special effects and bonuses provided by this item
ZWOLF.SizeStepsHint: Positive or negative steps to change size
ZWOLF.FutureSideEffectsHint: Additional side effects may be added in future updates
ZWOLF.BiographyOnlyForCharacters: Biography is only available for character actors
ZWOLF.ConfigurationOnlyForCharacters: Configuration is only available for character actors
ZWOLF.ConfigurationNotForSpawns: Configuration is not available for spawn actors
ZWOLF.NoEquipment: No equipment in inventory. Use the drop zone below to add items.
ZWOLF.EquipmentDropHint: Any equipment item can be added to your inventory
ZWOLF.AwesomeProgressionWarning: Awesome Progression for Attributes is only available if granted by a Track or Talent
ZWOLF.NoKnackSlots: No knack slots available. Add an Ancestry, Fundament, or Talents to gain knack slots.
ZWOLF.NoTrackSlots: No track slots available at level {level}.
ZWOLF.NoTalentSlots: No talent slots available at level {level}.
ZWOLF.ShortRestTooltip: Short Rest: -1 SP, restore VP to max, gain Suffused
ZWOLF.ExtendedRestTooltip: Extended Rest: restore SP & VP to max, gain Suffused, remove Bruised, reminder to roll Fortitude
ZWOLF.PushToActorsTooltip: Update all Actor copies of this Item
ZWOLF.ConditionProneDesc: The character is lying on the ground and must spend movement to stand up.
ZWOLF.ConditionDazedDesc: The character is disoriented and has difficulty acting effectively.
ZWOLF.ConditionStunnedDesc: The character is unable to act or react to threats.
ZWOLF.ConditionBruisedDesc: The character has taken minor injury and may suffer penalties.
ZWOLF.ConditionWoundedDesc: The character has taken significant injury and suffers penalties.
ZWOLF.ConditionDyingDesc: The character is at death's door and will die without stabilization.
ZWOLF.ConditionSuffusedDesc: The character is infused with magical energy.
ZWOLF.ConditionOffGuardDesc: The character's defenses are compromised and they are easier to hit.
ZWOLF.ConditionParalyzedDesc: The character cannot move or take physical actions.
ZWOLF.ConditionMomentumDesc: The character has built up momentum and gains bonuses to actions.
ZWOLF.ConditionGrabbedDesc: The character is being held by another creature and has restricted movement.
ZWOLF.ConditionHelplessDesc: The character is unable to defend themselves effectively.
ZWOLF.ConditionShakenDesc: The character is frightened and suffers penalties from fear.
ZWOLF.ConditionBatteredDesc: The character has taken repeated punishment and is weakened.
ZWOLF.ConditionImmobilizedDesc: The character cannot move from their current position.
ZWOLF.ConditionInvisibleDesc: The character cannot be seen by normal vision.
ZWOLF.ConditionQuickenedDesc: The character can act with increased speed.
ZWOLF.ConditionBlindedDesc: The character cannot see and suffers severe penalties to visual actions.
ZWOLF.ConditionConcentratingDesc: The character is maintaining focus on a spell or ability that requires concentration.
ZWOLF.AttunementTierHint: The attunement tier (Tier 1 = Level 5, Tier 2 = Level 9, Tier 3 = Level 13, Tier 4 = Level 17)
ZWOLF.AppliesToHint: Select which equipment item this attunement enhances
ZWOLF.AppliesToTextHint: Specify which equipment this attunement applies to (e.g., 'Flaming Sword' or 'any sword')
ZWOLF.AttunementRequiredHint: Prerequisites for using this attunement tier
ZWOLF.OverextendedSlotTooltip: Using this slot causes long-term Shaken
ZWOLF.OverextendedSlotWarning: Using this slot causes long-term Shaken
ZWOLF.OverextendedAttunementWarning: Warning: The overextended attunement slot (last slot) causes the character to be Shaken as long as it is used.

Settings.AutoResetBoostsHint: Automatically reset Net Boosts to 0 after each roll
Settings.DebugModeHint: Enable debug logging for Z-Wolf Epic dice system
